Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Requires higher education research facilities to provide information to the department of education regarding dogs or cats available for adoption
Summary: Requires higher education research facilities to make available certain information regarding the adoption of dogs or cats on their website.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring higher education research facilities to make available certain information regarding the adoption of dogs or cats
